name: qiankun-micro-frontend-demo
description: 完整的qiankun微前端架构示例项目

scripts.dev:subs: concurrently "npm run dev:react-1" "npm run dev:react-2" "npm run dev:react-3" "npm run dev:react-4" "npm run dev:react-5" "npm run dev:vue-1" "npm run dev:vue-2" "npm run dev:vue-3"
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:subs
scripts.build:subs: npm run build:react-1 && npm run build:react-2 && npm run build:react-3 && npm run build:react-4 && npm run build:react-5 && npm run build:vue-1 && npm run build:vue-2 && npm run build:vue-3
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:main && npm run install:subs
scripts.install:subs: cd sub-apps/react-app-1 && npm install && cd ../react-app-2 && npm install && cd ../react-app-3 && npm install && cd ../react-app-4 && npm install && cd ../react-app-5 && npm install && cd ../vue-app-1 && npm install && cd ../vue-app-2 && npm install && cd ../vue-app-3 && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:main && npm run lint:subs
scripts.lint:subs: cd sub-apps/react-app-1 && npm run lint && cd ../react-app-2 && npm run lint && cd ../react-app-3 && npm run lint && cd ../react-app-4 && npm run lint && cd ../react-app-5 && npm run lint && cd ../vue-app-1 && npm run lint && cd ../vue-app-2 && npm run lint && cd ../vue-app-3 && npm run lint
scripts.test: npm run test:main && npm run test:subs
scripts.test:subs: cd sub-apps/react-app-1 && npm run test && cd ../react-app-2 && npm run test && cd ../react-app-3 && npm run test && cd ../react-app-4 && npm run test && cd ../react-app-5 && npm run test && cd ../vue-app-1 && npm run test && cd ../vue-app-2 && npm run test && cd ../vue-app-3 && npm run test
